thread.title: California’s Prop. 39 Is a Winner
thread.title_full: California’s Prop. 39 Is a Winner - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: California’s Prop. 39 Is a Winner
text:
In your Aug. 19 editorial “Tom Steyer’s Stimulus” you mischaracterize the success of Proposition 39, the California ballot measure I co-chaired with George Shultz and Kevin de León in 2012. In truth, hundreds of millions of dollars in extra funds are now flowing to California schools because of this law.
Prop. 39 closed a corporate tax loophole for companies that ship local jobs to other states. Schools are using the money for much needed upgrades to their energy systems. In the first 16 months of the program, our schools...
